title: I Have No Retirement, $50k in Debt, & I Want a Divorce (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Struggling in a failing marriage with debt and no retirement,

Buying a home through your employer,

How lending clubs are screwing people,

Budgeting for a spouse to stay at home.


Support Our Sponsor:

Churchill Mortgage

NetSuite

Zander Insurance


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
